projects.title: TaskQuest
projects.description: Turn team tasks into thrilling quests. Admins create tasks on the web dashboard, share bot links with team members, and track progress through an intelligent Telegram bot interface.

projects.title: FinTellect
projects.description: An intelligent personal finance management platform with AI-powered insights through RAG-based chat interactions, helping beginners understand how stock markets work.

projects.title: FitFusion
projects.description: A comprehensive gym management app that allows users to look into gyms and give reviews, where gym owners can register their gyms.

experience.description: Contributed to full-stack development projects with focus on modern web technologies and user experience optimization.
achievements: Developed responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
Implemented RESTful APIs and database integration solutions
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in an agile environment
Optimized application performance resulting in 30% faster load times
Participated in code reviews and maintained high code quality standards

extracurriculars.description: Leading developer relations initiatives, organizing technical workshops, and fostering community engagement among 500+ student developers.
achievements: Built partnerships with tech companies for student opportunities

extracurriculars.description: Contributed to the organization and execution of a major technical conference, handling logistics and participant coordination.

Supported technical setup for workshops and presentations
